bibl.title: The archive of Cornelius, komarch of Philadelphia
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Col. Inv. 39a = P. Aegyptus Cent. 20 P. Mich. Inv. 1361 = P. Aegyptus Cent. 21; Inv. 2151a = P. Aegyptus Cent. 18; Inv. 2151b = P. Aegyptus Cent. 19 145.4 P. Mich. Inv. 1352; 1354 P. Osl. II, 37
W.G. Claytor & Roger S. Bagnall, The Archive of Cornelius, Komarch of Philadelphia.
Edizione di testi nel centenario della rivista Aegyptus (P.Aegyptus Cent.). Tomo I = Aegyptus 100 (2020) pp. 173-194, figg.

18. Receipt for Rent. Philadelphia, 30 October 286p. - 19. Receipt for Hay. Philadelphia, 30 Sep., 287p. - 20. Lease of Epinemesis Land. Philadelphia, 289/290p. - 21. Receipts for Chaff and Barley. Philadelphia, 15-23 July, 9 August 301p. - Corrections to published texts: P. Osl. II, 37; S.B. XII, 10982 [= P. Mich. Inv. 1352]; P. Mich. Inv. 1354 [ed.: Daniel Ullucci, A Loan of Wheat, BASP 50 (2013) pp. 129-134, fig.].
